page.title: 06STRETHALL
page.content: The{Strethall}parish is the smallest in the country.The church's arch is one of the oldest in the country. The{farmhouse}near the church was once a{manor house}.The quakers set up a village library in the manor house. The church isn't in the same place as the village because of the plague. Long ago 3{gypsies}got information that the farmer was mistreating his wife.So they went to do something about it.but the farmer got word of this and was waiting at the top of the stairs in his house with a shotgun. When the gypsies broke in he shot the first,killing him immediately.The second was badly wounded.But the third got away without injury.The body of the dead man was hung in the church tower and people paid a penny to see him.
